## ğŸ“‹ Triage Checklist

### For Maintainers
- [ ] Issue confirmed
- [ ] Severity assessed
- [ ] Priority assigned
- [ ] Assignee identified
- [ ] Reproduction steps verified
- [ ] Environment information complete

### Labels to Apply
- `bug` (always)
- `severity:critical` / `severity:high` / `severity:medium` / `severity:low`
- `component:<name>` (if applicable)
- `needs-reproduction` (if not reproducible)
- `good-first-issue` (if suitable for new contributors)
